questions.question_text:
DRAG DROP -
Drag and drop the labels into the correct boxes, placing them in the correct order from top to bottom, for diagramming a recommended multi-tier VMware Tunnel deployment.
Select and Place:
//IMG//
Which domain attribute must be included to meet the SAML assertion requirement for Just-In-Time provisioning in Workspace ONE?

discussion.content:
answer is D
The SAML assertion must include the userName attribute.

choices.D: The telephone numbers dialed and received
choices.E: The SMS message content sent and received
choices.C: The total voice minutes used for all cellular calls
choices.A: Websites visited while using cellular data
choices.B: The cellular data use in terms of total bytes sent and received

comments.content: You can't see the content so the suggested answer is right

questions.question_text: Which two telecom data settings can be enabled and collected by an administrator? (Choose two.)

choices.C: Host a copy of the Certificate Revocation List
choices.B: Manage CA security permissions from the console

questions.question_text: Which three functions does Workspace ONE UEM Integration with a Microsoft Certification Authority (CA) allow administrators to execute? (Choose three.)

choices.E: The VMware Tunnel application is not published to any Android device
choices.B: The Per-App Tunnel certificate is expired
choices.C: The Mobile SSO for Android authentication method is not configured
choices.A: Application B was not configured properly under Network Traffic Rules
choices.D: Application B was not configured to use a Per-App VPN profile

discussion.content:
I confirm A and D, page 9
https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-Workspace-ONE/services/WS1_android_sso_config.pdf

questions.question_text:
An organization uses Mobile SSO for two Android applications, Application A and B. Application A signs on correctly, however, Application B never does Single
Sign-On on any Android device.
Which two could be the cause of the issue? (Choose two.)
